Package com.facebook.buck.util.i18n

Class NumberFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.i18n.NumberFormatter
  • @ThreadSafe
public class NumberFormatter
extends Object
    Thread-safe and i18n-safe wrapper for NumberFormat (which is not thread-safe).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NumberFormatter​(java.util.function.Function<Locale,​NumberFormat> numberFormatCreator)
      Given a function which creates NumberFormat objects for a Locale, returns a wrapper providing thread-safe access to the formatter for that locale.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods
